cafe_thriving.speaker: Narrator
cafe_thriving.text: Dragon Haven Cafe has become legendary. Travelers come from across the realm just to glimpse the dragon, to taste your cooking, to feel the warmth of this special place.

regular_visits.speaker: Narrator
regular_visits.text: Marcus stops by between adventures. Lily sends promising young chefs to train with you. Garrett tends flowers in your garden. Vera brings tales from the sea.

noble_peace.speaker: Narrator
noble_peace.text: The Noble, now simply called by their true name, visits often - no longer hiding behind a mask, fully themselves at last.

siblings_healed.speaker: Narrator
siblings_healed.text: Elena and Thomas have rebuilt their bond. They celebrate holidays together now, and sometimes, they even cook together.

mother_happy.speaker: Narrator
mother_happy.text: Mother tends her cottage garden and visits for tea every afternoon. The illness is a distant memory - love and truth proved stronger than any secret's burden.

dragon_magnificent.speaker: Narrator
dragon_magnificent.text: Your dragon has grown even more magnificent. Children gasp in wonder when they see it. Adults remember what it felt like to believe in magic.

final_sunset.speaker: Narrator
final_sunset.text: You stand at the cafe's entrance as the sun sets, your dragon beside you. Through your bond, you share a moment of perfect peace.

reflection.speaker: Narrator
reflection.text: You think of Elara, all those centuries ago, making the choice that would lead to this moment. Her courage. Her compassion. Her legacy.

your_legacy.speaker: Narrator
your_legacy.text: Now it's your legacy too. The line of Dragon's Heart continues. The sanctuary stands. And love - for family, friends, and a dragon who chose you - fills every corner of Dragon Haven Cafe.

final_words.speaker: Narrator
final_words.text: As the first stars appear, your dragon rumbles contentedly. Tomorrow will bring new customers, new challenges, new adventures.

the_end.speaker: Narrator
the_end.text:
But tonight, you simply enjoy the warmth of belonging. Of purpose. Of home.

~ THE END ~

Thank you for playing Dragon Haven Cafe.
